description: Try our easy to follow Herb And Mustard Roast Beef With Cauliflower Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Herb And Mustard Roast Beef With Cauliflower Mash
name: Herb And Mustard Roast Beef With Cauliflower Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the beef across the grain. Divide mash between plates, top with slices of beef. Serve with roasted cherry tomatoes and steamed green beans.
